import React,{Fragment, useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ company:'', website:'', location:'', skills:'', status:'', bio:'', twitter:'', facebook:'', linkedin: '', youtube:'', instagram:'' }); const [displaySocialInputs,toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, skills, status, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)}/> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs &&
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default CreateProfile
